```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE) 
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(tidyverse))
library(ez)
library(foreach)
library(kableExtra)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(ggpubr)
library(lsr)
library(report)
library(rempsyc) # for t-tests in nice tables
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

#### anova setup #### 
options(contrasts=c("contr.sum","contr.poly"))

#### load data #### 
wd <- getwd()
analysisName = 'tazoot_SDT'
dataName <- sprintf("/Users/jennymotzer/Documents/GitHub/ZOOT/stats/%s.csv", analysisName)
data <- read.csv(dataName)

#### Change to categorical vars ####
data$SID = factor(data$sdt_SID)
data$nontargetContrast = factor(data$sdt_nontargetContrast)
data$Target = factor(data$sdt_Target)
data$Validity = factor(data$sdt_Validity)

### Plotting setup #### 
colors = c("#F8A299","#CCCCCC","#98E6A1")
attComparison <- list( c("1","3"), c("1","2"), c("2","3") )

significance <- list(cutpoints = c(0, 0.0001, 0.001, 0.01, 0.05, Inf),
symbols = c("****", "***", "**", "*", "ns"))
```

### SDT 
## d prime
# detection
```{r Det}

## det dprime 
d = data 
detdPrime_anova = ezANOVA(
  data = d,
  dv = .(det_dPrime),
  wid = .(SID),
  within = .(Target, nontargetContrast, Validity)
)
knitr::kable(detdPrime_anova)

```

```{r NP Det}
## det dprime filtered nontarget present
d = data %>% filter(nontargetContrast==2)

detdPrimeNP_anova = ezANOVA(
  data = d,
  dv = .(det_dPrime),
  wid = .(SID),
  within = .(Target, Validity)
)
knitr::kable(detdPrimeNP_anova)

```

```{r NA Det}
## det dprime filtered nontarget absent

  data = d,

  wid = .(SID),
  within = .(Target, Validity)
)
knitr::kable(detdPrimeNA_anova)

```


### paired t-test
## detection dprime
#all conditions
```{r vi_detdAll, echo = FALSE, out.width = "90%"}
## valid vs. invalid All
d = data 
dt = d %>% filter(nontargetContrast == 1, Validity == 1 | Validity == 3)
t.test(dt$det_dPrime ~ dt$Validity, paired=TRUE) %>% report %>%
  as.data.frame -> stats.table
names(stats.table) <- c(
  "Parameter", "Group", "Difference", "t", "df", "p", "CI", "CI_lower", "CI_upper",
  "Method", "Alternative", "Cohens_d", "d_CI_low", "d_CI_high"
)
my_table <- nice_table(stats.table, report = "t.test", title = "tazoot det dprime: all valid vs invalid")
my_table
```

```{r vn_detdAll, echo = FALSE, out.width = "90%"}
## valid vs. neutral All

  "Parameter", "Group", "Difference", "t", "df", "p", "CI", "CI_lower", "CI_upper",
  "Method", "Alternative", "Cohens_d", "d_CI_low", "d_CI_high"
)
my_table <- nice_table(stats.table, report = "t.test", title = "tazoot det dprime: all valid vs neutral")
my_table
```

```{r in_detdAll, echo = FALSE, out.width = "90%"}
  as.data.frame -> stats.table
names(stats.table) <- c(
  "Parameter", "Group", "Difference", "t", "df", "p", "CI", "CI_lower", "CI_upper",
  "Method", "Alternative", "Cohens_d", "d_CI_low", "d_CI_high"
)
my_table <- nice_table(stats.table, report = "t.test", title = "tazoot det crit: NA valid vs invalid")
my_table
```
